Class ParticleSystem

java.lang.Object
  ParticleSystem
Direct Known Subclasses:
ParticleSystem3D
public class ParticleSystem
extends java.lang.Object

The Particle System class defines a system of particles. It has a number of particles, and a radius which describes the maximum lateral distance a particle can reach from the center of the system before being removed.

Author:
Christopher Glasz

Nested Class Summary
(package private)  class ParticleSystem.ParticleSystemException
          Exception thrown when dealing with particle systems

          The head of a list of particles

findParticle

private Node findParticle(Particle particle)
                   throws ParticleSystem.ParticleSystemException
Finds the given particle in the system and returns the node pointing to it. If the particle is not found, an exception is thrown.
